item.title: Cambits, a modular imaging system that can transform into many different cameras
item.author: Kyle Roderick
item.description: Cambits, a modular imaging system that can transform into many different cameras, developed by Columbia Engineering Computer Science Professor Shree Nayar and Makoto Odamaki, visiting scientist from Ricoh Corporation.
